CustomField.formula: IF(AND(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=6, (NOW()-CreatedDate)*24>66), true, IF(AND(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=7, (NOW()-CreatedDate)*24>42), true, IF(AND(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))=1, (NOW()-CreatedDate)*24>30), true, IF((NOW()-CreatedDate)*24>24, true, false))))
CustomField.label: ResponseHandler
